enterConferenceNameOrUrl: Enter your connection token or URL shown in SkyMake Web Interface

onboarding.conferenceUrl: Enter the connection token (or full URL) of the room you want to join.
onboarding.settingsDrawerButton: Click here to open the settings drawer.
onboarding.nameSetting: This will be your display name, others will see you with this name.
onboarding.emailSetting: The email you enter here will be part of your user profile.
onboarding.startMutedToggles: You can toggle if you want to start with your audio or video muted here. This will be applied to all conferences.
onboarding.serverSetting: This will be the server where your conferences will take place. You can use your own, but you don't need to!
onboarding.serverTimeout: Timeout to join a meeting, if the meeting hasn't been joined before the timeout hits, it's cancelled.
onboarding.alwaysOnTop: You can toggle whether you want to enable the "always-on-top" window, which is displayed when the main window loses focus. This will be applied to all conferences.
